China EV sales slow in January-February as competition intensifiesChina's pure electric vehicle sales slowed in January-February from the same period a year earlier, industry data showed on Friday, as competition intensified with market leader BYD heading a deeper round of price cuts. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 05:35:26 GMT VDD4BASZ6NN33KBJDOYGRHR6BM https://www.reuters.com/business/auto-transportation/china-ev-sales-slow-january-february-competition-intensizes-2024-03-08/Reuters商业汽车与交通
Punching and pumping iron, Chinese women go 'YOLO'Without a job, friends or direction in life, a 30-something woman decides to take up boxing, triggering a physical transformation that is the narrative of the biggest box office for any movie in China this year. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 05:32:08 GMT WWVFZR3GLRNB7CGEQSYLQDDQDQ https://www.reuters.com/lifestyle/punching-pumping-iron-chinese-women-go-yolo-2024-03-08/Alessandro Diviggiano生活方式
China Evergrande liquidators appoint legal advisers, sources sayChina Evergrande's liquidators have hired three law firms to advise on the troubled property giant's winding-up process, according to sources with direct knowledge of the matter. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 05:20:41 GMT PUKIXOBNM5O4RAPBF5ZZ4USODU https://www.reuters.com/business/china-ever-greatest-liquidators-appoint-legal-advisers-sources-say-2024-03-08/Scott Murdoch商业
Bond trustee becomes new petitioner to liquidate China developer KaisaA Hong Kong court adjourned a hearing to liquidate Chinese property developer Kaisa Group to April 29 after a bond trustee, instructed by a major group of dollar bondholders, replaced the original petitioner. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 05:15:51 GMT ZLPHLWVTXFLDBGFFYUZ63WJMOA https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/bond-trustee-becomes-new-petitioners-liquidate-china-developer-kaisa-2024-03-08/Reuters市场亚洲市场
Alibaba's Lingxi Games says management to step down to make way for younger execsLingxi Games, Alibaba Group's video games arm, has told staff its leadership team will step down to make way for younger management, according to an internal memo. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 05:12:51 GMT H57GAJEETRKYJDQWFJCOBBQKOU https://www.reuters.com/technology/alibabas-lingxi-games-says-management-step-down-make-way-younger-execs-2024-03-08/Josh Ye商业工作世界
Huawei, SMIC used US tech to make advanced chips, Bloomberg reportsChinese companies Huawei Technologies and Semiconductor Manufacturing International Corp used US technology to produce an advanced chip in China in 2023, Bloomberg News reported, citing people with knowledge of the matter.
